title: How does Britain know what time it is?
description:
Did I need to get a radio controlled clock and travel to Anthorn to film this video? Absolutely not. But for a few minutes, that clock was really, really accurate. • Thanks to the team at NPL! More about NPL Time: https://www.npl.co.uk/time-frequency/time-scales - their Open Day is on 20th May! https://www.npl.co.uk/open-day

I'm at https://tomscott.com
on Twitter at https://twitter.com/tomscott
